snippet: The Senate killed an effort to let employers and health insurance companies deny coverage for services they object to on religious or moral grounds.
abstract: Senate upholds President Barack Obama's birth control policy, voting to kill a Republican effort to let employers and health insurance companies deny coverage for contraceptives and other items they object to on religious or moral grounds; vote illustrates sharp divide between the parties.
lead_paragraph: The Senate killed an effort to let employers and health insurance companies deny coverage for services they object to on religious or moral grounds.

headline.seo: Birth Control Coverage Measure Defeated in Senate
headline.main: Senate Rejects Step Targeting Coverage of Contraception
